Maverick AV Solutions with: Vision Audio Visual

VISION designs and manufactures professional installation products that are exceptionally easy to sell and install and so reliable, they come with a lifetime guarantee.

Our installation products include wall, free-standing and mobile mounts, connectivity solutions and audio - the essential bits that complete your smart solutions for workspaces in the office and home.

Our strong engineering team, commitment to high build quality, vigorous quality assurance, high stock availability and open-book approach makes VISION a brand you can rely on to deliver for you and your customers, where ever in the world they are based.

We work hard to anticipate market needs and answer with practical and pragmatic solutions, like our F10/HB portable trolley designed for Hub, which frees the display from the meeting room for flexibility of use and to support a safe return to work.

Easy to sell

We know the value of upselling every sale of a display with the installation accessories that enable it to be used effectively and safely. Our range provides you with mounting, audio and cabling solutions for meeting rooms.

There’s no time to waste when upselling a customer so we make finding the right mount or cable to a snap with two powerful tools that narrow down the product you needs in seconds - our Mount Finder and Cable Finder, USB buttons. Simply click to launch your browser and take you straight to our Finder page.

Easy to install

We are AV engineers that focus on what installers need to get the job done as efficiently as possible.

We design our products to be easy and quick to understand and install, with flexibility but without unnecessary complications or gimmicks.

We avoid the need for special tools and where possible use thumbscrews for assembly. We shy away from kits and aim to include everything needed to install the product.

Easy to trust

We go the extra mile to ensure our products’ build quality so they are robust and reliable and because we believe in transparency with partners, take an open-book approach to failure rates.

We’re happy to say our failure rates (below) are well above industry norms, but we are never satisfied. Any product returned to us as faulty is tested at our factory to see how we can improve. And did we mention, we’re so confident in our products, we back them all with the Vision Lifetime Warranty.

Easy to source

We understand that when you need our products you want them as soon as possible. VISION has built high stock levels with more than 1,000 items currently available and we have taken proactive steps to counteract Brexit’s negative effect on UK imports.

Our LIFR (Line Item Fulfilment Rate) is usually 95% and even with the negative impact of Brexit, we have been able to achieve 88% in February and are building back to normal levels every month.

We hold stock across warehouses in the UK and EU and move it in response to demand. Using a Microsoft Azure-based algorithm enables us to predict where stock will be needed and move it pre-emptively. Should more stock be required than is showing on the system give us a call because we usually have plenty of stock to call on from other warehouses.

Whether you are selling or installing VISION products, it’s quick and easy to savvy-up with VISION Navigator Training.

Dip in and out of our interactive video training on your phone or desktop whenever you want, or complete 26 sessions and receive a Vision Navigator certificate.

New to VISION? Check out some of our VISION solutions that fit current trends and needs like mobile communication and collaboration and home working.
